contentList.content: Your ability to utilize an innate trait a number of times equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. Regain all expended uses after finishing a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Your ability to utilize an innate trait per <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
You gained an additional Aptitude point to utilize your innate trait one more time per Long Rest.
The number of times you can use your breath weapon.

Your ability to channel your Draconic Ancestry and exhale magical breath a number of times equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. Regain all expended uses after finishing a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
You can now use your breath weapon attack more times per Long Rest.
The number of times you can use Stonecunning.

Your ability to attune with rock and stone to detect non-flying invisible creatures a number of times equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. Regain all expended uses after finishing a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
You can now use Stonecunning more times per Long Rest.
The number of times you can use Adrenaline Rush.

Your ability to tap into your inner reserves to Dash as a bonus action, gaining <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag> equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. Regain all expended uses after finishing a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
You can now use Adrenaline Rush more times per Short or Long Rest.
The number of times you can use your Giant Ancestry boon.

Your ability to call on your Giant ancestry for a beneficial boon a number of times equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. Regain all expended uses after finishing a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
You can use your Giant Ancestry boon more times per Long Rest.
The number of times you can teleport with the Raven Queen's blessing.

Your ability to call on the Raven Queen for a blessing of teleportation a number of times equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. Regain all expended uses after finishing a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
You can now use Shadowfell Step more times per Long Rest.
